subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the first time since the Mets and the Braves flip-flopped their positions in 2006, the Braves come to New York with both teams in realistic pursuit of a division title.
snippet: For the first time since the Mets and the Braves flip-flopped their positions in 2006, the Braves come to New York with both teams in realistic pursuit of a division title.
